doc:
Harry Lennix https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Lennix 0 Harry Joseph Lennix III (born November 16, 1964) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles as Terrence "Dresser" Williams in the Robert Townsend film The Five Heartbeats (1991) and as Boyd Langton in the Joss Whedon television series Dollhouse. Lennix currently co-stars as Harold Cooper, Assistant Director of the FBI Counterterrorism Division, on the NBC drama The Blacklist. Lennix played Calvin Swanwick in the DC Extended Universe. Harry_Joseph_Lennix_III ( born November_16_,_1964 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_roles as Terrence_"_Dresser_"_Williams in the_Robert_Townsend_film The_Five_Heartbeats ( 1991_) and as Boyd_Langton in the_Joss_Whedon_television_series_Dollhouse . Lennix_currently_co-stars as Harold_Cooper , Assistant_Director of the_FBI_Counterterrorism_Division , on the_NBC_drama The_Blacklist . Lennix played Calvin_Swanwick in the_DC_Extended_Universe .
